Series II: Correspondence, Miller to Butor and others

Series II is less comprehensive than Series I, as Butor donated his letters from Miller to the Biblioth√®que Nationale de France, and Miller did not keep copies of all of her letters to Butor. This series also includes clippings and photos that Miller had intended to send along to Butor, and correspondence between Miller and various other people who have some connection to Butor.
